about.title: Personal Information
about.description: I'm a full stack developer with experience in building web applications using PHP/Laravel and JavaScript/TypeScript. I'm currently studying Business Informatics at FH Aachen. I am also a working student at <link> Johnny Bytes GmbH.</link>
